Review ID: 1,2025-01-15,Smartphone,"Purchased a new smartphone from Takealot. The phone works great, exactly as advertised, but delivery took a bit longer than expected. Tracking updates were helpful."
2,2025-01-16,Laptop,"Ordered a laptop, but it arrived with a scratched screen. Customer service was slow to respond, and the return process was a hassle. Disappointed."
3,2025-01-17,Headphones,"Amazing sound quality on these headphones! Fast delivery and well-packaged. Takealot nailed it with this one."
4,2025-01-18,Smartwatch,"The smartwatch is decent, but the battery life is shorter than advertised. Customer support was unhelpful when I reached out."
5,2025-01-19,Tablet,"Received a tablet that was clearly used, not new as described. No response from Takealot after multiple emails. Very frustrating."
6,2025-01-20,Gaming Console,"Console works perfectly, and my kids love it. Delivery was delayed by two days, but the product quality made up for it."
7,2025-01-21,TV,"Bought a 55-inch TV during a sale. Price was unbeatable, and delivery was on time. Highly recommend Takealot for tech deals."
8,2025-01-22,Wireless Router,"Router stopped working after a week. Customer service asked for bank statements for a refund, which felt invasive. Still waiting for resolution."
9,2025-01-23,External Hard Drive,"Great storage capacity and speed. Delivery was a bit slow, but the product is solid. Will buy again."
10,2025-01-24,Smart Speaker,"The speaker has good sound, but setup was tricky. No clear instructions, and customer support didn’t help much."
11,2025-01-25,Camera,"Fantastic camera quality! Arrived in perfect condition, and the price was better than other stores. Very happy."
12,2025-01-26,Monitor,"Monitor had dead pixels. Return process was complicated, and I’m still waiting for a refund after two weeks."
13,2025-01-27,Keyboard,"Really nice keyboard for the price. Delivery took longer than promised, but the product is great for gaming."
14,2025-01-28,Mouse,"Mouse works fine, but it feels cheap. Expected better build quality for the price. Delivery was on time, though."
15,2025-01-29,Drone,"This drone is awesome! Easy to fly and great camera quality. Takealot delivered it quickly and in perfect condition."
16,2025-01-30,Smartphone,"Ordered a phone, but it never arrived. Tracking said delivered, but nothing was at my door. Customer service was no help."
17,2025-01-31,Laptop,"Laptop performs well for work. Delivery was delayed, but the packaging was secure. Overall, a good purchase."
18,2025-02-01,Headphones,"Best headphones I’ve ever bought! Crystal clear sound and comfortable fit. Takealot’s service was spot on."
